# layout(_:)

**Type Method**

Specifies the direction of text layout.

## Declaration

```swift
static func layout(_ direction: UITextLayoutDirection) -> UITextDirection
```

## Text direction types

- **storage(_:)**: Specifies the direction of text storage.
